passive_1: Taking magic damage from champions grants you a shield that absorbs 10 – 120 (based on level) (+ 4% maximum health) magic damage for 4 seconds (15 second cooldown).
motd:
Hotfix: • Noxian Persistence base shield reduced to 10 – 120 (based on level) from 10 – 140 (based on level). 

  • Noxian Persistence cooldown increased to 15 seconds from 12.
passive_4: Requires *Blessing of Noxus* and two Legendary-tier items equipped.
